Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Cargo hook release malfunction. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Corrosion due to moisture accumulation in sealed compartment
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Reduce inspection interval for affected component type
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
Remarks: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.
Part V: Remarks by Design
Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate.
Date: 27/03/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai
